overview: Two women meet online. Over the course of a few months, they share an intimate connection that develops over phone calls, texts and other virtual exchanges. The possibility of meeting in real life fills them with curiosity, hesitation, longing and maybe even a little bit of catastrophising for their own individual reasons. Do they end up on the same page? Will they meet? Will they hold hands? The conversation unfolds.
title: Begum Parvathi
